attributes.comment:
these fee increases effect people adopting internationally. the cost for
adopting 1 child internationally can cost as much as $35-40k already. The
current wait times for getting items processed are astronomical (I-600),
fingerprints etc. Unless you can PROMISE that these fee increases are going to
change that, then don't pad the already thick government offices that process
these. Someone once published that based on the cost of the current I-600 and
the time it truly requires to physically process it, you are getting paid
hundreds of dollars to do a project that takes just minutes! It is unreal as it
stands now! Do NOT raise the fees!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Stephanie Lehman
